page.title: 16HORTICULTURAL SHOW AWARDS
page.content: There are a number of cups awarded at the show for such things as the most points in each section, the best potato and the best kept allotment in the village. The allotments are off Blacksmiths Lane and provide much needed extra space for those with smaller gardens. An allotment should be of a size to grow enough vegetables for a family for a year. At the end of the show, the produce is usually donated by the exhibiter to the auction which is held then. As the Horticultural Society is non profit making, the majority of the money raised at the auction goes to local charities or causes. Mrs. P. Ware
